posts.post_title: FS: Cy Young T206 Piedmont Portrait PSA 2
posts.post_content:
####CLOSED-sending to Probstein#####

Asking $750 delivered in the US.  Thanks for looking.

Would consider trading for a 1952 Topps PSA 2/3 Willie Mays, 1965 Topps Joe Namath RC, 1961 Fleer Wilt Chamberlain #8, 1948 Leaf or 1949 Bowman Jackie Robinson. Also looking for a 1979 OPC Gretzky rc PSA 5/6. 

No qualifiers on any potential trade bait-thanks. Card must be PSA graded and decently centered. I can add up to $300 PP on the deal to make it happen.
